SELECT c_term.id, c_term.`name`, c_term.`explain`, b_status.`name` STATUS,
COUNT(c_client_id) number,
IFNULL(select_strategyset.number,0) strategy_num FROM c_term LEFT JOIN b_status ON c_term.`status` = b_status.`value` AND b_status.b_status_main_id = 1 LEFT JOIN c_client_term ON c_term.id = c_client_term.c_term_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b_strategy_clientterm.c_term_id,COUNT(b_strategy_term_apply.id) number FROM b_strategy_clientterm LEFT JOIN b_ctrl_strategy2_apply ON b_strategy_clientterm.b_ctrl_strategy_id = b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.id LEFT JOIN b_strategy_term_apply ON b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.b_strategy_term_id = b_strategy_term_apply.id WHERE
b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.status = '1' AND b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.b_user_id IN ${pd.userids} GROUP BY b_strategy_clientterm.c_term_id ) select_strategyset ON select_strategyset.c_term_id = c_term.id WHERE 1=1 AND
c_term.status = '1' AND c_term.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids}
and ( c_term.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}),'%') )
and ( c_term.explain LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.explain}),'%') )
GROUP BY c_term.id

SELECT b_strategy_clientterm.c_term_id,b_strategy_term_apply.id,b_strategy_term_apply.`name` FROM c_term LEFT JOIN b_strategy_clientterm ON b_strategy_clientterm.c_term_id = c_term.id LEFT JOIN b_ctrl_strategy2_apply ON b_strategy_clientterm.b_ctrl_strategy_id = b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.id LEFT JOIN b_strategy_term_apply ON b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.b_strategy_term_id = b_strategy_term_apply.id WHERE c_term.id = #{pd.c_term_id} AND b_ctrl_strategy2_apply.status = '1' AND c_term.status = '1' AND b_strategy_term_apply.b_user_id IN ${pd.userids} AND c_term.sys_user_id IN ${pd.userids} GROUP BY b_strategy_clientterm.c_term_id,b_strategy_term_apply.id
SELECT c_term.id, c_term.`name`, c_term.`explain`, c_term.`status` FROM c_term WHERE c_term.id = #{id}
